member.name: P:OrchardCore.MiniProfiler.MiniProfilerOptions.AllowOnAdmin
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to allow Mini Profiler on the admin too when the feature is enabled, not just on the frontend. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.MiniProfilerOrchardCoreBuilderExtensions.AllowMiniProfilerOnAdmin(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OrchardCoreBuilder)
member.summary: Allow Mini Profiler on the admin too when the feature is enabled, not just on the frontend.
